title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act 

2017 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (victims crime) act 2017 (commencement) order 2023

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act
heading: 2. The 30th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which 
section 30(b)(ii) of the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act 2017 (No. 28 
of 2017) shall come into operation for the District Court sitting in District No.
text_norm: 2 30th day november 2023 appointed day section 30(b)(ii) criminal justice (victims crime) act 2017 (no 28 2017) shall come operation district court sitting district no

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act
heading: GIVEN under my Official Seal,
text_raw:
18. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 November, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th December, 2023.
